Uses of Package
tripleplay.particle

  • Packages that use tripleplay.particle 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.particle  
    tripleplay.particle.effect  
    tripleplay.particle.init  
  • Classes in tripleplay.particle used by tripleplay.particle 
    Class and Description
    Effector
    Encapsulates a single effect on a particle, for example, moving it based on its current velocity.
    Emitter
    Emits and updates particles according to a particle system configuration.
    Generator
    Adds particles to an emitter according to some policy.
    Initializer
    Used to initialize a new particle.
    ParticleShader
    A custom shader designed for shading particles.
  • Classes in tripleplay.particle used by tripleplay.particle.effect 
    Class and Description
    Effector
    Encapsulates a single effect on a particle, for example, moving it based on its current velocity.
  • Classes in tripleplay.particle used by tripleplay.particle.init 
    Class and Description
    Initializer
    Used to initialize a new particle.
